@template promo_template
{{html:
<head>
<style type="text/css">
	h1 { color: #FFF;font-size: 30px;}
	.inputEmail { background-color: transparent;border: 0;border-bottom: 1px solid #FFF;outline: 0;width: 320px;font-size: 22px !important;padding: 5px 0px; color: #FFF;}
	h2 {color: #A7A7A7;line-height: 38px;}
	::-webkit-input-placeholder {color: #A7A7A7;}
	:-moz-placeholder { color: #A7A7A7;  }
	::-moz-placeholder {  color: #A7A7A7;  }
	:-ms-input-placeholder {  color: #A7A7A7;  }
	.marginTop1 { margin-top: 15px;}

@media (max-width: 1376px) {
 	h1 { color: #FFF;font-size: 25px;line-height: 19px;}
 	h2 {color: #A7A7A7;line-height: 32px;font-size: 20px;}
 	.inputEmail {font-size: 20px !important; }
 }	

 @media (max-width: 768px) {
 	h1 { color: #FFF;font-size: 16px;line-height: 16px;}
 	h2 {color: #A7A7A7;line-height: 24px;font-size: 13px;}
 	.inputEmail {font-size: 13px !important; }
 }
</style>

</head>


<div class="container">
    <a class="logo" href="../$$space"><img src="/$$space/.files/img/logo-colored.png"></a>
        <div class="col-md-12 marginTop1">
        	<h1>Oops, Sign Up is temporary not available.</h1>
            <h1>Sorry for this inconvenience.</h1>
            <h2>Leave your e-mail address here and we will send you an invite<br /> with a promotion code when Sign Up is back available.</h1>
            <input class="inputEmail" type="text" name="email" placeholder="Your Email"/>
        </div>
</div>




}}
